revision.text:
{{ZScriptNote}} '''[[Structs:SecPlane|SecPlane]]'''
native int '''PointOnSide'''(Vector3 ''pos'') const
==Usage== Determines which side of the SecPlane the given point resides on. The direction the plane's normal points is considered the front.
===Parameters=== *''pos'' - The absolute map coordinate to check against.
===Return Value=== Returns -1 if behind the SecPlane, 1 if in front of it, or 0 if on it.
==Examples== {{noexamples}}
[[Category:ZScript]] [[Category:SecPlane]]
